problem.display_name: Quiz: Total Amount Paid to Project Reviewers
problem.markdown:
As we mentioned, Udacity project reviewers are paid per project that they review.
>>How much money do you predict was paid out to project reviewers last month?<< ( ) Under $50,000 ( ) $50,000 to $150,000 ( ) $150,000 to $250,000 (x) $250,000 to $350,000 ( ) Over $350,000
[explanation] Udacity paid out over $300,000 to project reviewers in the past month. [explanation]
problem.p: As we mentioned, Udacity project reviewers are paid per project that they review.
How much money do you predict was paid out to project reviewers last month?

choicegroup.label: How much money do you predict was paid out to project reviewers last month?

div.p: Udacity paid out over $300,000 to project reviewers in the past month.
